choices.text:
Put together a healthy meal plan for me for this week.  I can't have dairy, garlic, honey, almonds, pistachios, or cashews
Monday:
- Breakfast: Gluten-free oatmeal topped with berries and a drizzle of coconut oil.
- Snack: A mixed green salad with grilled chicken breast, avocado, and a balsamic vinaigrette made without honey or almonds.
- Lunch: A quinoa bowl with roasted vegetables (excluding onions), diced chicken, and a side of fresh fruit.
- Dinner: Baked salmon topped with a lemon juice and olive oil sauce, steamed broccoli, and brown rice.
Tuesday:
- Breakfast: A scrambled egg white wrap with spinach, tomato, and avocado.
- Snack: A banana and a glass of almond milk.
- Lunch: A chicken Caesar salad made with grilled chicken breast, romaine lettuce, croutons (made without almonds or cashews), Parmesan cheese (without honey), and a homemade caesar dressing without garlic or almonds.
- Dinner: A stir-fry made with tofu or tempeh, broccoli, carrots, and zucchini in a ginger and soy sauce mixture. Serve over brown rice.
Wednesday:
- Breakfast: Plain yogurt with fruit (excluding pistachios) and granola made without honey or almonds.
- Snack: A apple slices and a handful of nuts (not cashews).
- Lunch: A turkey sandwich on gluten-free bread with avocado, tomato, and lettuce.
- Dinner: A pasta dish made with gluten-free noodles, marinara sauce (without honey or almonds), and grilled chicken breast. Toss in some zucchini and squash for extra veggies.
Thursday:
- Breakfast: Omelet made with spinach, tomato, and onion (excluding garlic) filled with goat cheese and served with a side of fruit.
- Snack: A carrot and celery sticks with hummus (without honey or almonds).
- Lunch: A tuna salad sandwich made with canned tuna, mayonnaise (made without honey), and diced celery on gluten-free bread.
- Dinner: Grilled shrimp skewers marinated in a lemon juice, olive oil, and herb mixture (excluding garlic). Serve with a side of rice pilaf made with brown rice, pineapple chunks, and diced ham (without honey or almonds).
Friday:
- Breakfast: A smoothie made with banana, mango, yogurt (plain), and a handful of spinach. Blend in a bit of honey for sweetness if desired.
- Snack: A bag of popcorn air popped without added butter or oil.
- Lunch: A salad made with mixed greens, diced chicken breast, avocado, and a balsamic vinaigrette (made without honey or almonds). Toss in some sliced strawberries for a sweet touch.
- Dinner: Grilled steak (without garlic) with a side of roasted potatoes and broccoli.
